# tv_quality_inspection_log

## Setup
```bash
python3 -m venv .venv
source .venv/bin/activate
python -m pip install -r requirements.txt
```

## Run
```bash
PORT=8000 python main.py
```

## Test
```bash
curl -s http://localhost:8000/
```
